transcript:
Customer: Hello.

Executive: Haan. Sir phone cut gaya tha. Wahi bol raha hun dekho sir aapne bola main agree kar raha hun aapko buyer hum provide karne ke liye baithe hain. Aapne bola ki mere ko unlimited quantity rehta. Abhi sir aap IndiaMART ek baar open karenge. Main aapko dikhata hun sir aapke Assam ka ek buyer ne 200 ton ka dala hua hai kal ka requirement.

Customer: Ek baar aap open to karo sir ek baar baat to karo.

Customer: Karo to humko ye bhi delete kar diya hai. Dekhiye hum login nahi liye hota hai.

Executive: Sir main bol raha hun sir aap dekho aisa nahi main aapko wahi bol raha hun.

Customer: Hamara pass app hi nahi hai hum delete kar diya hai. Hum login dekho hamara logout ka time dekho kitna der mein.

Executive: Sir ho sir hoga main wahi bol raha hun dekho sir aapne paisa diya hua hai aapka pass abhi aadhi service 6 mahine ki bachi hui hai sir aap dekho sir business.

Customer: Suniye suniye ek baar baat jo bolo sir mera paisa chala gaya bhik mein de diya IndiaMART ko nahi chahiye.

Executive: Sir aap bhik wali baat nahi dekho.

Executive: Sir suno dekho aap dekho.

Customer: Suno to sir ek mein meri suno main aapke main aapke sari baat agree kar raha hun ek baar meri suno aap. Main ye bol raha hun sir baat paise ki nahi hai aap service use karo 6 mahine sir ek mahine mein business kar lete hain log ek buyer agar takra gaya na sir aapka pura ROI nikal jayega sir aapko bhi pata hai aapka profit of margin kitna hai product mein kitna aapko bachta hai sab aapko pata hai sir ek deal bhi achi ho gayi na 200 ton 100 ton ki aapka pura paisa nikal jayega. Sir main ye nahi bol raha hun ki aap kuch karo aap use to karna shuru karo sir service ko use nahi karoge tab tak kaise response miloge.

Customer: Sir service use karne se humko gussa aata hai. Kyun gussa aata hai hum bolta hai haan. Hum hum customer ko phone karta hai. Hello. Aapka side mein kuch hai to agar side mein aaiye to bahut sara hai.

Executive: Ji ji boliye.

Customer: Hum sir aapka service use karne se humko gussa aata hai haan. Kya hota hai hum customer ko phone karta hai. Sab deal hone ke baad customer bol dekhiye abhi abhi abhi man lijiye aap hamara customer hai aapko IndiaMART se mila hai haan. Aap humko madam de raha hai 9 foot ka bal. Chaliye theek hai hum 9 foot ka de dega lekin 9 foot mein to usko cutting karna padta hai na. Agar aapke liye hum 9 foot ka cutting karega aap nahi lene se hum wo mal ko kya karega. Isiliye hum bolte hain humko advance do. Dekhiye hamara to koi fraud nahi hai hamara GST apply hua hai wo jo NMS ka certificate hai hum to koi usme fake kam nahi karega. Agar hum advance leke mal nahi dega to hamare upar action lo na usme to koi barawat nahi hai. Waha pe jaake kya ho kya hota hai customer bolta hai humko delete delete nahi hai hum business nahi karega aisa. To aap kyunki ye hua hai aap logon ka app mein aap logon ka IndiaMART mein koi fake fake aake aisa karke sabko kiya hai abhi hum jo real customer hai.

Customer: Hello.

Executive: Sir bilkul bilkul bilkul sir sun raha hun. Ji ji sun raha hun sir aapki baat. Aapka side mein agar phone hai thoda side mein aaiye na.

Executive: Nahi nahi side mein hai main bahar aa gaya hun cabin ke bataiye.

Customer: Haan wo yahi baat hai dekhiye mera to koi fake nahi hai. Agar usme agar mera jaisa agar koi fake karega to hum usme kyun bhugatega bhai.

Executive: Nahi nahi bilkul main samajh gaya dekho aisa nahi wahi main aapko samjhane ki kar raha hun sir aisa nahi hai.

Customer: Isiliye isiliye agar aap humko app use karne ke liye bol raha hai hum wo hum aapko bol raha hai mera app aap use kijiye aap use karke humko customer dijiye iske liye to main pay kiya na aur chaliye aur pay karega hum agar aap humko.

Executive: Bilkul sir main wahi bol raha hun sir aap dekhiye hamara genuine company hai genuine documents hai sab kuch genuine hai.

Customer: Sab kuch hai sir main agree kar raha hun dekho hum kyun man lega hamara fake hai hum uske usme.

Executive: Sir sir dekho kya hota hai ek cheez batao sir dekho ab kabhi kabhi kya hota hai koi buyer hota hai ho sakta hai uske sath fraud hua ho. Theek hai to wo ab gussa koi milta hai dusre pe nikal deta hai theek hai rahi baat aisa nahi hai aap sir online market aapko pata hai 10 tarike ke aate hain main wahi batane ki koshish kar raha hun kuch log hote hain jo aapse paisa puchte hain product ka chale jate hain batata hun sir kuch hote hain ki are nahi itne mein karwa ke do.

Customer: Isiliye isiliye isiliye aapko ek chota example de raha hai haan instagram aap chalate hain hum bhi chalate hain haan shahrukh khan bhi chalata hai lekin shahrukh khan ke naam ke piche blue tick laga hua hai uska account koi fake fake nahi kar sakega lekin aap aap shahrukh khan ke naam leke account khuliye main bhi khulunga lekin hum logon ko bluetooth nahi milega kyunki hum log fake hai.

Executive: Are wo shahrukh khan celebrity ban gaya ab uski barabari hum thodi kar payenge ab ye batao sir wahi bol raha hun.

Customer: Wo aapko ek suniye aapko wo celebrity ka nahi aapko example de raha hai kyunki uska account real hai insta mein isiliye uska bluetooth laga hua hai lekin hum log paisa deke india mart mein bhi hamara koi matlab aisa fake nahi laga hua hai hum original ya fake hai dikkat hum logon mein nahi aap logon ke app mein aap logon ke company mein pehle aap genuine customer ko side kijiye fake ko hatao.

Customer: To mera ke sath bahut galat raha hai.

Executive: Nahi main bilkul samajh gaya dekho sir wahi main bata raha hun aapka already yaha pe verified ho aap apni profile ek baar open karoge na aapki profile ke aage verified jaise aapne bataya na ke example diya aapne shahrukh khan wala wahi main bhi bata raha hun sir aapke bhi companiya open karoge na aap IndiaMART apni profile aap ek baar check karna apne naam se usme aage likha hua hai aap verified ho IndiaMART pe aapka ek ek cheez ka verification hua hai aapka GST verified team ne kiya hai mobile number verified kiya hai email address verified kiya hai tabhi humne aapko IndiaMART pe register kiya hai agar GST nahi hota to hum aapko register bhi nahi karte sir aapka GST team ne liya hoga pehle ke.

Customer: To to theek hai.

Customer: Hum fake karke ek ek account udhar kholega dekhiye dekhiyega.

Executive: Sir open nahi hoga aap dekh lijiyega sir nahi hoga nahi hoga sir aapko lagta hai aisa open karke aap dekhiyega bina GST ke aap account open hi nahi kar sakte IndiaMART pe.

Customer: Ji aapko malum nahi hai bahut aadmi log aisa karke fake karke business kar raha hai lekin wo business nahi hai wo wo scam hai.

Executive: Sir dekho online aapko bhi pata hai bahut scam hote hain ab kisi ko hum mana to nahi kar sakte na scam karne agar pata hota to hum police mein complaint na kar dete sir hame thodi pata hai ki samne wala call kar raha hai mujhe ye scam karne ke liye mujhe call kar raha hai aapko to pata hi hai online market fraud hote hain wahi main bol raha hun sir 10 tarike ka buyer online milta hai aapko but aapko baat karke baat karne ke baad hi to pata chalega sir kaisa buyer hai ab man lo koi buyer bola mere ko material bhej do fir main paisa dunga to aapko lag raha hai na material kyun bhej do sir aap advance payment karo kuch main aapko material bhejta hun sir.

Customer: Haan wahi to hum bolta hai advance payment karo material bhej dega usi time mein aapko bolta hai usi time mein bolta hai nahi nahi hum kaise karke believe karega ye ye kaisa wo bolo sir aap aap profile check karo IndiaMART pe mera GST number check karo GST portal pe jaake mera GST check karo genuine wo cheez aap bataoge na samne buyer ko ki sir mera GST check karo aap jaake dekhiye wo kya hum nahi bolega hamara certificate sab hum pasa diya hai hum to sab kuch bolta hai hum verified hai hum aisa hai waisa hai.

Executive: Certificate dekho ab ek to buyer aise nikal jata hai dekho sir trust aapko bhi issue hai mujhe bhi trust rehta hai issue sabko trust issue rehta hai koi bhi agar 50000 ka.

Customer: Ji ji isiliye isiliye aapko dekhiye aap aap log dekh sakte hain na mera aas pass do abhi do party order laga ke rakha hai na to aap aap log wo party se baat karo hamare sath ek baar aap baat kijiye genuine supplier hai.

Executive: Sir hamara kam baat karna nahi hai sir manager hum aapko support karne ke liye ab hum buyer se baat nahi kar sakte na ab hame kya pata product ki kya costing hai kya pricing hai hum to nahi baat kar payenge na sir wo.

Customer: Theek hai aap aap log broker ke jaisa kam kijiye udhar.

Executive: Nahi sir hamara kam broker ka nahi hai company ne hame hire kiya hua hai aapko batane ke liye ki sir aap ye kami hai aap isko improve karo tab buyer aayega kya buyer aapki lead kam ki nahi aa rahi hai kya dikkat hai main check karke batata hun sir ye dikkat hai is vajah se lead aapko kam ki nahi aa rahi hai sir aap isliye hum log baithe hue hain sir aapko batane ke liye support karne ke liye aapne batai complaint ki mere ko fake buyer aa raha hai mere se fraud karne ka kam kar rahe hain main batate raho sir aap advance payment ke liye bolo jo buyer advance ke liye ready hai aap usse deal karo jo bolta hai nahi material bhejo usse deal hi mat karo sir aap account manager se connect karo ki check karo IndiaMART pe register hai ki nahi hai ye mere se advance material mang raha hai hum check karke batayenge IndiaMART pe register hoga to hum bol denge sir de sakte ho aap ye registered hai GST number ye hai but agar aapne humne bola yaha pe register nahi hai aap mat deal karo sir.

Customer: Online deal kaise bina trust karna aapke upar hai.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Haan.

Customer: Hello abhi aawaz aa rahi hai.

Customer: Nahi aa rahi.

Customer: Hello abhi aawaz aa rahi hai.

Customer: Network nahi hai network nahi hai.

Customer: Hello hello.

Customer: Haan hello aap suniye hum wo app use nahi karega pehle baat yahi hai haan.

Executive: Sir dekho use nahi buyer aayega kaise.

Customer: To wahi to wahi baat hai agar aap buyer ko humko direct connect kar dega to baat hoga nahi to sir aap use kar dekho sir direct hum kaise connect kar denge aapko service service to use karni padegi na.

Customer: Dekhiye humko malum hai paisa humko kaise karke nikalna hai wo humko bahut achi se malum hai.

Executive: Sir wo aapko main dekho main kisi cheez ke liye main mana nahi kiya aapko main solution hi de sakta hun sir.

Customer: 35000 diya to mera 35000 diya to lekin main aap logon ka upar koi action nahi lega wo jo nitish hai na jisne mere se wo connect kiya tha uska mere pass sabhi call recording hai main direct uska upar action lega wo.

Executive: Sir aap bilkul lo sir unhone kya commit kiya ye to main nahi bola aapne agar ye mere ko starting mein bola hota meri team ko main us pe zarur action un pe leta unse baat karta aapka refund kara deta ab aap 6 mahine baad aap mere ko ye issue bata rahe sir 6 mahine baad hum log kya kare hum to aapko solution bata sakte hain service aise use karo ye issue aa raha hai ye issue.

Customer: Hamara hamara 35000 gaya koi baat nahi wo humko kaise karke recovery karna hai wo humko bahut achi se malum hai.

Executive: Bilkul sir aap businessman aapko pata hai kaise aap recover karoge.

Customer: To wahi apna recover karoge. Haan?

Executive: Sir aap businessman aapko pata hai sir kaise aapko recover karna hai apna paisa kahan se business karna hai to hame batana thodi hai sir business kaise karna hai aapko.

Customer: Dekho business idhar end hai mera business idhar end hai lekin ek legal mein jaake hamara hum jaisa bhi hai jo bhi hai hum jaake usko jaake hum hamara paisa hum refund lega haan agar is beech mein agar aapko ho sake to aap mera account use kijiye chahiye to aapke aap hum company dekho sir hame company khud paisa de raha hai hame account aapka kaise handle kar sakte hain hum na hi broker ke end se kam karte hain na kuch hamara kam ye nahi hota sir hame company ne aapke support ke liye baithaya hua hai account dila deta hun agar aap account ye nahi hai sir hamara kam ye sir ek baat suno sir mera kam ye to nahi hai na ki hum aapki lead consume karke buyer se baat karenge haan interested hai lo aap baat kar lo wo hamara kam nahi hai hum hamara kam hai aapko buyer provide karna aap baat karo aap bolte ho nahi ye buyer mere product se relevant nahi aa raha mere product se kam ka nahi hai dusre product ka aa raha hai hum us pe kam karenge aapko us tarah ka product jab jab hum app liya tha us time kyun bola hum connect kar dega customer se us time kyun sir wahi cheez wo cheez unhone sales person aapko kya bola aapne wo cheez main agree kar raha hun unhone galat galat bol ke aapko bech diya hai.

Customer: Sales person yahi bolega to hum yahi manega hum to bola aapne aisa to hai nahi team ne uske baad connect nahi kiya hoga aapko properly team ne connect kiya hoga video meet se bataya hoga aapka account head office se handle ho raha hai call recording hota hai agar hum ye call kat ke agar hum call karega wo call recording nahi hota ye sab humko kaise malum hai wo humko bola isiliye to humko malum hai dekho sir bilkul main recording recording kaun si hoti hai jaise abhi aap baat kar rahe ho na aap aap dekhoge company ka number hai zero ek karke company ka number hai but agar main apne personal number se call karunga wo recording nahi hota hai na sir wo kaise record ho jayega ye to company ka number hai na sir ye to company ka number hai na sir jisse abhi baat ho rahi hai recording ho rahi hai sari aapse jo baat hai recording pe ho rahi hai wahi main bol raha ab jo agar main direct kam baat karunga to mujhe nahi pata ab aapko bhi nahi pata hai to aap sidha ya to bol do ki recording line se baat karo mujhe jo bhi baat karni hai recording line team call karegi aapko mera pass recording hai aap whatsapp kijiye hum recording aapko bhej deta hai hum hamara sath kya baat hua tha sir bilkul agree kar raha hun but ab dekho baat nikal gayi abhi hum aapko dekho yahi solution de sakte hain na sir aap service use karo hum aapko proper guide karte hain kaise use karna hai use nahi karega hum sir dekho fir to wahi baat hai fir hum kaise aapko solution denge fir aap fir aap humse kya help chah rahe hain sir aap batao aap humse kya chah rahe hain mera 35000 do return karo sir wo abhi ye batao service aap 6 mahine use karne ke baad aap mere se bologe refund kar do to possible nahi hai na sir aap agar ye cheez starting mein agar bol dete to team usko refund ke liye bolti na team jinhone aap se sell karaya tha field walon se unse bolti ki aapne paisa kyun liya aapne kya kya fake commitment ki hai ab aap 6 mahine ke baad bologe are mere ko business nahi aa raha hai ya fir main service use nahi karunga mera paisa refund kar to possible nahi hai na sir abhi aap bhi samjho aap se buyer koi paisa le material le raha hai material ke 6 mahine baad bolega maine use nahi kiya material mera wapas le lo material kya aap le loge theek hai theek hai humko paisa nahi chahiye customer do wahi to bol raha hun customer dene ke mana kab kar raha hun sir main customer dene ke liye ready hun aap use to karo wahi phone karega hum kyun phone karega mal hai bahut mal hai customer dena hai to phone maro hum ka wo aap phone mat karo main bol hi nahi raha hun phone mat karo main
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants a refund of ₹35,000.

- Customer is receiving fake or irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer is unable to use the IndiaMART app.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the verification process on IndiaMART.

- Executive suggested using the service for better results.

- Executive advised reporting fraudulent buyers.



Next Steps: 

Issue not resolved. No follow-up was provided.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, app, verification, fraud
